Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue ""localhost:8080/#/" changed to "localhost:8080/?#/" ?" (#2073) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
For example, in page "localhost:8080/#/temp1" has a input tag, when I modified the input value, and press "enter" button, because I did not add "@keydown.enter" event on the input tag, so the page url become to "localhost:8080/?#/login", but the right result should be "localhost:8080/#/login", so  I would like to know how the "?" add into the url?And what exactly happened when I press "enter" button?

### What does the proposed API look like?
For example, in page "localhost:8080/#/temp1" has a input tag, when I modified the input value, and press "enter" button, because I did not add "@keydown.enter" event on the input tag, so the page url become to "localhost:8080/?#/login", but the right result should be "localhost:8080/#/login", so  I would like to know how the "?" add into the url?And what exactly happened when I press "enter" button?
